title: Whats A Champion you feel guilty for hating?
body: My big ones are {{champion:75}}  And {{champion:92}} . I feel like you have to play like surgery against these champions because if they get the slightest advantage they can begin to snowball out of control. Now I know a TON of people hate riven but I acknowledge that she isn't in the best spot (As much as every time im against her she plays like a freakin korean =.=) Nasus I just hate because it's just that feeling of dread you get when he just starts to begin IGNORING any and all of my harass because Tanky Build+Innate Lifesteal=Genius
